data.message: Dear Marshall,i hope you had a nice birthday...I miss your old sound.Your lyrics are great but where are the classical hip-hop beats?Your new songs sound strange and unfamiliar.I miss this gloomy sound like "stay wide awake" or "3 a.m".I wish you all the best!

replies.message: That wasn't his old self in regards to the songs you mentioned (2009 Relapse) though that is one of my fav albums of his people still found something to criticize about it I remember everyone saying the "accent" annoyed them
